get_app_details.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific PromptMate app

props.name: appId
props.description: Select the app to get details for

get_job_status.description: Retrieve the status and results of a PromptMate app job

props.name: appId
props.description: Select the app for which to get job status

props.name: jobId
props.description: The ID of the job to check

props.name: onlyDefaultResultFields
props.description: Return only the default result fields

get_last_results.description: Retrieve the last result rows of a PromptMate app for examples or testing

props.name: appId
props.description: Select the app to get last results for

props.name: onlyDefaultResultFields
props.description: Return only the default result fields

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of result rows to return

get_user_info.description: Retrieve user information associated with the API key

list_apps.description: Retrieve a list of available apps

list_projects.description: Retrieve a list of available PromptMate projects

run_app.description: Runs a PromptMate app with the specified data

props.name: appId
props.description: Select the PromptMate app to run

props.name: data
props.description: Array of data objects to process. Each object must contain the required data fields for the selected app.

props.name: callBackUrl
props.description: URL to which the result of the job will be sent (optional)

props.name: noMailOnFinish
props.description: Send an email to the user when the job has finished

props.name: config
props.description: Configuration settings for the job (language, country, etc.)

use_template.description: Create an app from a specific PromptMate template

props.name: templateId
props.description: The ID of the template to use

new_app_result.description: Triggers when there is a new app result from PromptMate

props.name: restrictedAppIds
props.description: Only trigger for results from these specific apps. Leave empty to trigger for all apps.

props.name: webhookType
props.description: Choose when to trigger the webhook

props.name: webhookReference
props.description: Optional reference for this webhook (used for identification)
